thread.title: GDPR Takes Effect on Friday—Here’s What to Expect

author: Sam Schechner
title: GDPR Takes Effect on Friday—Here’s What to Expect
text:
On Friday, European Union privacy cops will start enforcing the new privacy law called GDPR, or the General Data Protection Regulation. Here are answers to some common questions about the deadline:
What is actually happening on Friday?
Following a two-year grace period after the law was enacted in 2016, data-protection authorities in EU member... RELATED VIDEO
